gud

The hostility against newcomers is frightening.

I played CS:S for the first time today. I had hesitated for a long, long time due to the amount of footage I've seen of 10-year-old kids yelling and screaming their heads off at other players. So I launch the game and pick a server to watch. Naturally, being a beginner, I went for one of those "newcomer-friendly" servers.

The second I open my mouth to say I've never played this game before, there were people voting to mute me. And it's not only me that was exposed to this kind of treatment. They can't stand each other and yet they taunt, bully, mock, and rage at all the other players on the server.  It's like a tribe of wild animals.

I have never been scared out of an entire genre in 30 minutes. This game is not friendly towards newcomers at all, and I can't with good conscience recommend this game, despite its enormous popularity. I said nothing bad towards anybody else and this is how I get welcomed into CS:S, a complete stranger, that nobody even knows.

If you can stomach it, then go play it and have fun. I'm saying this game is not for everyone and certainly not for me. If this is how people act on "newcomer-friendly" servers, I can just guess how well received new players will be anywhere else. I'm not even going to try CS:GO. Sorry, but I'm turned off from FPS games. If this is how people always treat each other, I'm sticking to Garry's Mod.

CSS: Careless Spending Simulator

The predecessor to Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Counter-Strike: Source is a still a great game. 

There are still many community servers. If you want to see a part of the Counter-Strike anthology, look no further.

[b][Caso encontre algum erro, por favor seja educado e avise pelo comentário][/b]

[h1]Counter-Strike:Source :[/h1][strike](Contra-Ataque: Souza é uma simulação de fazer gibi da "turma da mônica")[/strike]  
é um jogo [u]FPS (Tiro em Primeira Pessoa)[/u], este é a terceira versão do [b]Counter-Strike[/b], nesta versão é parecido com o primeiro [b](Counter-Strike 1.6)[/b], mas com outra engine chamado [b]Source[/b] a mesma usada no [b]Half-Life 2[/b]

[h1]Positivo:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Hardcore
[*]Um dos melhores jogos de FPS
[*]Trabalho em equipe
[*]Nova engine (por causa disso a Física funciona muito melhor que antes)
[/list]

[h1]Negativo:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Gráficos antigos, mas melhorado comparado ao antigos
[*]O que é Iron Sight

[/list]

[h1]Nota:5/5[/h1]
Recomendo joga Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, por ser uma versão muito melhor deste
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/Yudi4551/recommended/730]Analise do Counter-Strike:Global Offensive[/url]

[b]Quer mais? siga-me neste grupo [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/25901911-An%C3%A1lises-de-Yudi/]Análises De Yudi[/url][/b]

[b][Não esqueça de avaliar esta análise, isso é muito importante para mim][/b]

Ein Klassiker der Ego shooter.
Falls ihr ein Spiel sucht, wo ihr wirklich messen wollt ob ihr gut seit,
dann ist Counter Strike source das beste Spiel.
Es ist daher gut, da es für die Terroreinheit und die Antiterroreinheit die selben Waffen gibt (bis auf kleine unterschiede
=M16 und Ak47).
Spiele wie Call of duty, Batlefield, Medal of Honor können sich eine Scheibe dieses grandiosen Spiels abschneiden.
Es ist 2004 erschienen und ist immernoch besser als alle anderen Ego Shooter unserer zeit.
Vielen Dank Valve
Thank you very much Valve for this awesome Game
